name: NationTest
description: Unit tests for the Nation class methods in the BaseFaker library.

test_cases.name: nationality
test_cases.description: Tests the nationality method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: language
test_cases.description: Tests the language method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: capitalCity
test_cases.description: Tests the capitalCity method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: flag
test_cases.description: Tests the flag method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern and size.

test_cases.name: isoLanguage
test_cases.description: Tests the isoLanguage method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: isoCountry
test_cases.description: Tests the isoCountry method of the Nation class to ensure it matches the expected pattern.
